attributes.action: Call for Ross Thomson MP to vote as instructed by his constituents over BREXIT
attributes.additional_details:
Ross Thomson voted: 

- LEAVE in the referendum 

NO to: 
- second referendum 
- delay to BREXIT 
- indicative votes 
- Norway + 
- Customs Union 
- revoking Article 50 to prevent no-deal 
- power for MPs to block no-deal 
- confirmatory referendum on any deal 

YES to: 
- no-deal BREXIT 

Ross Thomson is clearly governed by his own self interest and is not representing the will of his constituency or country. He MUST change his position to reflect and represent that of his constituents.
attributes.background:
Ross Thomson, Tory MP, is betraying his constituents and his country. 

Ross Thomson represents the constituency of Aberdeen South, which voted by 67.9% to remain in the EU. 
Scotland voted by 62% to remain in the EU, yet Ross Thomson is a hard-line Brexiteer - see how he has voted below:

rejection.details: This would be a matter for the individual MP, not the UK Parliament and Government.
